comments.content:
'DAPPER' and 'Haircuts for Guys': [Binner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052110/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Binner)  
(One of the others is [Peignot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052110/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Peignot))
